official_title: Feasibility and Early Efficacy of the Maximizing Energy Intervention for Decreasing Fatigue Impact in Breast Cancer Survivors
inclusion_criteria:
* adult (18 years and older) pre and post-menopausal female at birth diagnosed with Stages I-IIIa breast cancer,
* completed primary treatment for breast cancer (surgery, chemotherapy, radiation) at least 6 months prior to ensure that fatigue is stable and chronic, - moderate to severe fatigue based on score â‰¥ 4 on the 7-point Fatigue Severity Scale,
* able to speak and understand English
* has a mobile device that runs on the Apple or Android platform
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* major depressive disorder, mania, hypomania, psychosis, or substance abuse in the past 3 months and
* disability due to diagnoses other than breast cancer.
